dict.string:
on alfred_script(q) set prevClipboard to the clipboard delay 0.05 set the clipboard to q
tell application "Alacritty" to activate tell application "System Events" repeat while (name of first application process whose frontmost is true) is not "alacritty" delay 0.05 end repeat delay 0.05 keystroke "v" using {command down} # paste query delay 0.05 key code 36 # return if q starts with "cd " then keystroke "l" using {control down} # clear screen in zsh end tell
delay 0.05 set the clipboard to prevClipboard end alfred_script
